root: ^Here are the flowers you wanted Anko. You have a good eye for knowing Yellow and Pink can go well together.
^Maybe one day, you too could be a Royal Flower Picker just like me.
^Wow Really!? I always wanted to be a Royal Flower Picker.
^I would feel bad if I left mama, papa, and the rest of the village behind.
^Buf if it means, I can make others smile with my flowers, then that would be a dream come true.
^It's true you do have to leave your home eventually. But that doesn't mean the people you care will disappear from your life.
^You will always have a home to come back to, and I am sure eveyone you loved will be waiting for you.
^If that's true, then I will do my best to study and train to become a Royal Flower Picker.
^I want to be able to bring people happiness with the flowers I pick.
^But first, I want to make my village happy and smiling. So can you come by tomorrow and help with some flower picking.
